title: IMBRASOS
content:
IMBRASOS was a river-god of the island of Samos in the Greek Aegean.

The Imbrasos was a small stream on Samos Island. Other personified Aegean island rivers included the Inopos of Delos and the Amnisos of Krete.

Pausanias, Description of Greece 7. 4. 4 (trans. Jones) (Greek travelogue C2nd A.D.)
          :
        "The Samians hold that the goddess [Hera] was born in the island by the side of the river Imbrasos."

A complete bibliography of the translations quoted on this page.
